name: L0n3 M4tr1X
description:
A lone AI Agent has woke up with the mission of cleaning up the virus on it's matrix.
This is our first game submission to a game jam. 

It is a simple text adventure with two simple RPG Battles.

Submitted for NEOC#01.

We developed the game mechanics, implemented using THREE.JS, React, our custom engine, GLSL. The music is also original as most of the assets.

It needs a lot of polish but for a first, we are ok with it. Hope you enjoy.
